content.p: Post Graduation Careers Consultant, Faculty of Registrars I have worked in careers and employability roles in Higher, Further and Secondary Education, most recently as a Careers Coach at Loughborough University, with responsibility for Loughborough Business School, the School of Mechanical, Electrical and Manufacturing Engineering, and international students. Prior to this, I worked in marketing, HR and retail management. telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
